about_the_game:
Includes a Mana Seed that unlocks the Mana user's latent abilities, as well as items and gold that will come in handy during the adventure.

Mark of the Axe
Mark of Armor
Mark of the Lyre
Bitter Potion
3000 Gold

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
